meanings.definition: A compound formed by the esterification of a single hydroxyl group with a single carboxylic acid group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a monoester in the lab for her experiment.
meanings.sent2: The monoester was used as a key ingredient in the production of the new medication.
meanings.sent3: The monoester decided to throw a party with its ester friends.
meanings.sent4: The monoester danced gracefully, twirling around the laboratory flask.
meanings.sent5: The monoester sparkled under the microscope, revealing its intricate structure.
